content: > this is the decrease 24 - jan 25 mkal for the solidsocks /groups/solidsocks group clues will be released on decrease 1 8 15 and 22 highwayman was a #1 hit for the highwaymen a country supergroup composed of willie nelson kris kristofferson waylon jennings and johnny cash it s a lovely song performed by some of my favourite artists the structure of the song lends itself very well to the mystery sock format instructions are provided for two sizes m l with 68 80 stitches per round the fit is similar to a vanilla sock with 62 70 stitches per round to fit a foot circumference of 8 5 9 5 most of the pattern is charted only you may use any technique you prefer for knitting a tube in the round you will need 100g of solid-coloured sock yarn for best effects pick a plump yarn with good stitch definition
